content: a smart addition to any wardrobe this classic cut button front knit vest is stylish and versatile stitched in patons classic wool worsted you ll do stocking stitch and 2 x 2 ribbing to create a timeless look with ribbed edges feel free to explore any color that complements your wardrobe flattering on a variety of body types the pattern is offered in a range of sizes materials patons® classic wool worsted™ 3 5 oz/100 g 194 yds/177 m sizes to fit chest measurement xs/s 28-34 71-86 5 cm m 36-38 91 5-96 5 cm l 40-42 101 5-106 5 cm xl 44-46 112-117 cm 2/3xl 48-54 122-137 cm 4/5xl 56-62 142-157 5 cm
